text: Dragan Pantelić (Serbian Cyrillic: Драган Пантелић; 9 December 1951 – 20 October 2021) was a Yugoslav professional footballer. He played as a goalkeeper. From 1979 until 1984, he played for Yugoslavia. Pantelić died on 20 October 2021 in Niš, Serbia from COVID-19, aged 69. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Yugoslavian footballers Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Serbia
title: Dragan Pantelić
